CustomField.formula: IF( OR ( ISPICKVAL(clofor_com_cfs__AFR__c,"Yes"), ISPICKVAL(clofor_com_cfs__CarrierType__c,"航空(AIR)"), ISPICKVAL(clofor_com_cfs__ConsolidationType__c,"Consolidation") ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Urgent cargo need your immediate action(Checked:Urgent Cargo)
CustomField.label: URGENCY PRIORITY(CHECK YES)
